collectible.title: Desire and Hope
collectible.text: "This light... is all of you." Special thanks to all of the artists on our server that helped make Yusuke's various paintings! You can now view all of them in this album: https://imgur.com/a/yMQEWIc
collectible.unlock: Witness the creation of three paintings by Yusuke. Different opponents may guarantee you different paintings! (Note: Yusuke must lose early enough to have time to paint.)
